review: I am not a techie but I decided to try this after reading several articles about it and talking to  friend who is an internet security expert.  After I received the package, I didn't open it immediately because I was worried I might not be able to set it up without assistance.  I finally told myself to just to give it a try.  My worries were completely unfounded.  Set-up was so simple, it surprised me.  I have not yet explored all of its capabilities but I am already watching TV shows and movies without difficulty.  Now, I am seriously thinking about telling my cable company to take a hike.
author: gwenshuman

review: Great product.  Easy set up right out of the box.
author: jon pizor

review: The content of the stick was great. Lots to choose from, many services in one location.However... This thing is slow and full of bugs.Despite having excellent connectivity and full wifi bars, it operated like 90s computer. It often showed error messages and buffered and loaded forever. The apps, like Netflix and YouTube are especially slow and often just plain don't work. After speaking 4 times with Amazon reps, we were told this was all due to the weak processor on the stick. We have decided to return the stick and let Amazon have the chance to redeem itself by purchasing the Fire TV.Hopefully, there will be no issues with it. Or maybe we are just used to the instantaneous functions of all of our Apple Products.
author: Kara Sylvester "Lactess"

review: Awesome!!! Now our family can enjoy movies together, the kids can play games, and I can use the fitness apps to workout from home.
author: MO Mom

review: Still fairly new to me, hoping to replace cable with it to save $ so many apps a Lil bit of buffering from time to time, but all in all I am happy with my purchase, I have been recommending to friends.
